attributes.action: DON’T PUNISH THE XL BULLY - PUNISH IRRESPONSIBLE OWNERS!
attributes.additional_details: People need to be held accountable for their dogs, as they are their responsibility! Legislation should be introduced where humans are prosecuted for their dogs actions. For example if a dog killer someone, their owner be sentenced to murder! This will stop irresponsible people considering dog ownership if not for the right reasons! This narrative being spread by the media that these dogs are “killers” is simply untrue. Any dog given love gives love back, no exceptions!
attributes.background: The XL BULLY are one of the softest, loving companions of all dog breeds! However, since the breeding market is on the decline; many are now subject to neglect and mistreated! Any breed of dog raised by uncaring irresponsible owners would be a bite risk!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
